item.justabattery.desc.mode.0: No Mode set. User Shift + Mouse-Right in world to change it.
item.justabattery.desc.mode.1: Fist found. The first found item is charged.
item.justabattery.desc.mode.2: All. The energy is given to all energy items at once.
item.justabattery.desc.mode.3: Random. The energy is given to a random item.
